heading: Croatian language.
general-note: Here are entered works on the language of the Croats treated as a separate language. Works on the language(s) of the Serbs or Bosnians treated as separate languages are entered under. Serbian language. or. Bosnian language.. Works on the language(s) of the Serbs, Croats, and Bosnians treated together as a single language are entered under. Serbo-Croatian language..
